message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to be discussing the sale of this product with you. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially offering it at $2,250,000. I believe this price reflects its potential and am open to discussing it further.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,800,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While your offer is closer to the mark, the value this product brings is truly unique.  To meet somewhere in the middle, I'd be willing to let it go for $2,000,000.  This is my best offer and I believe it reflects a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,900,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
